name: Aperiodic Tiling - Ur Pattern
description:
Abstract aperiodic pattern tile produced using tiling method and mathematics of Robert Ammann merged with medieval Islamic architectural design. First exhibited as "Girih Iteration" video in "The Smooth and the Striated Geometry and Landscape as Architectural Knowledge." Plug In new media section at Contemporary Istanbul art fair, Istanbul. 2013. Curated by Gökhan Karakuş. 

First ever aperiodic geometry in an NFT.
